name: Sonus Doom
description:
You power on, in your rusty metal body and look around yourself. You can hardly see anything, but you're programmed not to consider the circumstances. As your senses come back you feel a presence, multiple threats. They want you to stop functioning and they're waiting, patiently. Who will prevail?

"SoundFocus" module

Use your "SoundFocus" module to scan for presences. Judge them safe or hostile by sound. The sensor is sensitive and swift movement will destabilize its hearing ability, lowering the module's efficiency.

The Code Board

The code-reading system is used for venturing far from center. Scrapbots mimic scraps , luring repair-bots, like yourself, with deception. As their technology is advanced, they can't be discerned visually, but rather by their code. Every scrap and scrapbot has its own independent code and it can be read by hovering over them with the "SoundFocus" module cursor. The code of a scrap that is shown on the lower-left screen must not have an out-of-place digit, otherwise it's a fake.

Out-of-place digits can be connected to:

  • Parity:          2  5  8  0          or          9  1  2  7
  • Number difference:          4  2  8  3          or          7  5  6  1
